description:
With the return of the legendary delinquent Tachibana Hikaru, Pascal is in for the showdown of his life! Meanwhile, a young entrepreneur discovers the risks of product testing, and Kitano Yuusuke sends a message.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Densetsu no Furyou, Tachibana Hikaru / Perfect Plate / Kitano Yuusuke-kun no Angou Kouza
Legendary Delinquent, Tachibana Hikaru / Perfect Plate / Kitano Yuusuke-kun`s Code Lesson
伝説の不良, 立花ひかる / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 北野ゆうすけ君の暗号講座
